entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 02:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with snow at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
